exclusion:
1. Set controller in exclusion mode

2. Press button on the device for three seconds
inclusion:
1. Set controller in inclusion mode

2. Press button on the device for three seconds
label: DSI-101 binary switch

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

channels.name: meter_current
channels.label: Central scene number
channels.overview: Never fired off due to the firmware bug, had to add SCENE_ACTIVATION manually

parameters.label: B1 operation mode
parameters.description: B1 operation mode
parameters.overview:
0 - Turn off for short press/Dim down for hold (monostable switch)

1 - Turn on for short press/Dim up for hold (monostable switch)

2 - Bistable switch

3 - Scene activation mode

4 - Monostable switch. Each press/hold switches on/off/sends dim up/down state for devices from AG 3 or 11 (only first device from this AG is supported!)

5 - Bistable switch for devices from AG 3 or 11 (only first device from this AG is supported!)

parameters.label: Sensor 1 turn on value
parameters.description: Sensor 1 turn on value for AG 19

parameters.label: Sensor 1 command off value
parameters.description: Sensor 1 command off value for AG19

parameters.label: Sensor 1 conversion rules
parameters.description: Sensor 1 conversion rules
parameters.overview:
All commands are sent to devices in AG 19

0 - ignore sensor value

1 - send ON if Value <= Param20 and send OFF if Value >= Param21

2 - send OFF if Value <= Param21 and send ON if Value >= Param20

3 - send ON if Value <= Param20

4 - send ON if Value >= Param20

5 - send OFF if Value >= Param21

6 - send OFF if Value <= Param21

parameters.label: Sensor 2 command on value
parameters.description: Sensor 2 command on value for AG 20

parameters.label: Sensor 2 command off value
parameters.description: Sensor 2 command off value for AG 20

parameters.label: Sensor 2 conversion rules
parameters.description: Sensor 2 conversion rules
parameters.overview:
All commands are sent to devices in AG 20

0 - ignore sensor value

1 - send ON if Value <= Param23 and send OFF if Value >= Param24

2 - send OFF if Value <= Param24 and send ON if Value >= Param23

3 - send ON if Value <= Param23

4 - send ON if Value >= Param23

5 - send OFF if Value >= Param24

6 - send OFF if Value <= Param24
